channel.title: CVE Feed for pickplugins -- Accordion
channel.description: The latest CVEs for pickplugins -- Accordion

item.title: CVE-2024-47342|2024-10-07T13:12:12.341Z -- pickplugins -- accordion
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in PickPlugins Accordion accordions allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Accordion: from n/a through 2.2.99.
